alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Chester; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 26 at 9:42PM EDT until June 26 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 394 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN PIEDMONT NORTH CAROLINA ALEXANDER CABARRUS CATAWBA CLEVELAND DAVIE GASTON IREDELL LINCOLN MECKLENBURG ROWAN UNION NC IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA CHEROKEE CHESTER UNION SC YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADVANCE, BETHLEHEM, BLACKSTOCK, CATAWBA, CHARLOTTE, CHESTER, CONCORD, CORNWELL, CROUSE, ELLENDALE, FARMINGTON, FORK CHURCH, GAFFNEY, GASTONIA, GREAT FALLS, HICKORY, HIDDENITE, HUNTERSVILLE, INDIAN TRAIL, KANNAPOLIS, KINGS MOUNTAIN, LINCOLNTON, MATTHEWS, MILLERSVILLE, MOCKSVILLE, MONARCH MILLS, MONROE, MOORESVILLE, NEWTON, ROCK HILL, SALISBURY, SHELBY, ST. STEPHENS, STATESVILLE, STONY POINT, TAYLORSVILLE, TRINITY, UNION, AND WEDDINGTON.
